name: Energy of World
description:
Energy of world

Hey guys I created a game called energy of world. After a few hours of work I finally released the beta version. Their are 3 levels for ball game and 2 levels for the car level. Level 1 is the car level while level 2 is the ball energy. Level 3 mini game has not been decided yet but I will try to make it. This is the early version of the game.

Font is tolo from utopia
